mail_body:
Subject: Exciting News! Your Personalized Home Finding Journey Begins!

Dear [Employee Name],

We're thrilled to officially welcome you to [Relocation Company Name]! We're so excited to help you find the perfect home in [Location].

This email confirms your upcoming phone consultation with our dedicated relocation specialist, Sarah Miller. During this call, Sarah will delve into your specific needs and preferences, including your desired neighborhood, property type (furnished or unfurnished), budget, and any other requirements you may have. This will allow us to create a tailored search strategy just for you.

We're confident that with Sarah's expertise and our extensive network, we'll find you a place you'll love to call home. We look forward to speaking with you soon!

Best regards,

The [Relocation Company Name] Team
